Abstract: Yesterday afternoon, Margaret Mullen, a 29-year-old hairdresser at the Jean-Claude Biguine hair salon on 45th Street and Avenue of the Americas, stared out at the thousands of people crowded around the plate-glass windows of the salon and the conga line of young women waiting for Ms. Mullen's tonsorial skills at the front desk.     ''All these people need our help,'' Ms. Mullen said wearily.
LeadParagraph: Yesterday afternoon, Margaret Mullen, a 29-year-old hairdresser at the Jean-Claude Biguine hair salon on 45th Street and Avenue of the Americas, stared out at the thousands of people crowded around the plate-glass windows of the salon and the conga line of young women waiting for Ms. Mullen's tonsorial skills at the front desk.

Headline.Main: Getting Them Ready For the Big Event
Headline.PrintHeadline: 1/1/00: A PEACEFUL PARTY; Getting Them Ready For the Big Event
